get.description: UNAUTHENTICATED! report the status of the CRS

translationMetadata.description: The tool component version, in whatever format the component natively provides.

details.description: Keep in mind this endpoint is unauthenticated. Do not place sensitive details in this object. This is optional arbitrary content. This may be logged in error cases, but is mainly for interactive troubleshooting.

version.description: Version string for verification and reproducibility. Git commit, SemVer, etc...
